name: Boba Express
description:
A cute lil' shooter game, except you don't kill anybody! (WHATTT?)

You're a delivery person on a hot day where everyone wants bubble tea. There's a surge of orders and limited supply. Everyone is frustrated (who wouldn't be if you don't get your bubble tea on time, am I right?). Go around and find your customers, and shoot off anyone who tries to get bubble tea off you. Shoot them with some boba of course. 

Ever since Covid started, delivery workers have been heavily relied on, and not always treated the best. We created this game as a way of appreciating their hard work, while also empathizing with the ever increasing bubble tea craving we all have.

Game/Level Design: Grace Chua, Hans

Programming: Jing Lin, Shreyas Parbat

Art: CS

Music/Sound: Avik Chari

UI: Min, Avik
